name: Wild Snakes
description:
Be smart, be fast! Think different!
Fresh arcade and puzzle mix.

Solve the puzzles by guiding snakes to holes.
Collect all gems and find out the shortest routes.

Wild Snakes main features:
• Fresh original game play;
• Stylish visuals and sound effects;
• Ton of fun puzzles;
• Days of play.

Go higher with Wild Snakes:
• Power up your intellect;
• Speed up your reflexes;
• Sharpen your gestures.
